message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper is about improving text classification using recurrent neural networks, which is a common topic in the natural language processing (NLP) field. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of 2D max pooling and 2D convolution, which are common techniques in computer vision (CV) and machine learning (ML) fields. Therefore, cs.CV and cs.LG (Learning) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also utilizes deep learning models, which is a common topic in the artificial intelligence (AI) field. Therefore, cs.AI is another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of bidirectional LSTM, which is a common technique in the neural network (NE) field. Therefore, cs.NE is also a likely sub-category.
